data.eml:eml: New data on the genus Hybos Meigen (Diptera: Hybotidae) from the Palaearctic Region

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shamshev, Igor, Grootaert, Patrick, Kustov, Semen (2015): New data on the genus Hybos Meigen (Diptera: Hybotidae) from the Palaearctic Region. Zootaxa 3936 (4): 451-484, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3936.4.1
